scripts.build: npm run clean -ws && npm run build -ws
scripts.start:hi: npm run build && npm run serve -w @line/headless-inspector
scripts.start:hi:https: npm run build && npm run serve -w @line/headless-inspector -- --https
scripts.start:li: npm run build && npm run serve -w @line/liff-inspector
scripts.start:li:https: npm run build && npm run serve -w @line/liff-inspector -- --key=../../localhost-key.pem --cert=../../localhost.pem
scripts.code-check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.publish: npm run code-check && npm run build && npm publish -ws --access public
